short_summary: Programmer/Analyst services are needed. The job involves Programmer/Analyst work in Business Intelligence industry, starting in 2023-07-04 and ending in 2026-06-30. The job can be found in National Capital Region (NCR) and the delivery region will also be NCR. Expiration date is 7/4/2023 2:00pm
description: The job offers skilled Programmer/Analyst from 2023-07-04 to 2026-06-30 in the National Capital Region (NCR).

full_summary:
# Request for Proposal

**Title:** A.7 Programmer / Analyst 

**Reference Number:** cb-6048-23812087

**Tender ID:** 23-58011

**Publication Date:** 2023-05-31

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-04 14:00:00 (Local Time)

## Tender Overview

The National Research Council of Canada is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers to provide a Programmer/Analyst to support the CanExport program's Business Intelligence development efforts.

## Tender Details

### Contract Term:

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-07-04
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2026-06-30

### Requirements

* The supplier must provide a Programmer/Analyst to support Business Intelligence development efforts.
* The supplier must demonstrate expertise in computer programming and analysis.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Opportunity

This tender is open to suppliers with a presence in the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Regions of Delivery

The supplier must be able to deliver services in the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Contact Information

* Name: Roxanne Azzi Abboud
* Email: Roxanne.AzziAbboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* Phone: 613299-9650
* Address: 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0R6

## Document Attachments

Please find the tender documents attached to this notice.

* Programmer/Analyst Tender Notice
* Programmer/Analyst Tender Notice (Revision 1)

Please note that this tender is no longer open for bid. 
Please note that all the information on this document has been edited to conform to Canadian Format. 
All efforts were made to make the document easy to read. However, you should still be aware of all the terms and condition of the original document in case I made an error. OR if the Contractor comes back and says, wait a minute, that's not what
